Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

Class TestHFileArchiving

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.TestHFileArchiving
public class TestHFileArchiving extends Object
Test that the HFileArchiver correctly removes all the parts of a region when cleaning up a region

      Get the names of all the files below the given directory
      Parameters:
